name: Synthwave Run
description:
A synthwave style endless runner. The objective is to avoid the obstacles and achieve the highest score!

How to play:

I recommend to use the left and right arrow keys to move side to side but you can also use the 'A' and 'D' keys.

Press the Space bar to jump.

Press ESC key while playing to pause the game or you can press the pause icon in the upper right corner of the in-game screen.

Customization:

You can choose bewteen two hoverboard models for now but more models will be added soon!

Recommendation:

Download the pc version of the game for the best performance and game experience.
